content:
Issues

  • What is the key distinction between internal and referential members?

  • When if ever are requests relayed to target resource?

  • Integrity: Does deletion from collection deletes from ordering?

  • Requirement for unnamed referential members?

  • Requirement for server-enforced orderings?

  • What kinds of ordering constraints are needed?

    • first, last, absolute, relative?
